PHRASE.LANG: A vital accessory to the X55 “Jungle Stalker” Stealth Combat Suit, these mechanized grasping claws serve a variety of functions – from clearing brush and scaling harsh terrain to delivering deadly blows in close combat. [#Legal]

Un accessoire vital la Tenue de Combat Furtive X55 "Jungle Stalker ", ces griffes mécanisées servent plusieurs fonctions comme débarrasser le brousaillage, grimper un terrain difficile, ou lancer des coups mortels pendant le combat rapproché. [#Legal]

A vital accessory to the X55 “Jungle Stalker” Stealth Combat Suit, these mechanized grasping claws serve a variety of functions – from clearing brush and scaling harsh terrain to delivering deadly blows in close combat. [#Legal]
